titles.title: I See The Lord, High And Lifted Up

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see the Lord, high and lifted up,
Seated on the throne of my life. (2x)
You are holy, You are holy, You are holy,
Seated on the throne of my life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I see the Lord, high and lifted up,
Seated on the throne of my life. (2x)
You are holy, You are worthy, You are mighty,
Seated on the throne of my life.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Veo al Senor alto y sublime
Sentado en el trono de mi corazon (Repetir)
Y eres santo, eres santo, eres santo,
Sentado en el trono de mi corazon
